actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 93-1398.

official_title: Concurrent resolution accepting the gift of the centennial safe and expressing the thanks of the Congress to the late donor, Mrs. Charles F. Deihm, and authorizing its display in the Capitol to create interest in the forthcoming bicentennial.

summary.text: Accepts the gift of the centennial safe and expresses the thanks of the Congress to the late donor, Mrs. Charles F. Deihm. Authorizes the display of such safe in the Capitol, in such location as determined by the Joint Committee on the Library, during the 1976 bicentennial celebration.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution accepting the gift of the centennial safe and expressing the thanks of the Congress to the late donor, Mrs. Charles F. Deihm, and authorizing its display in the Capitol to create interest in the forthcoming bicentennial.
